text: Pablo Arnaud Carreño (born 8 January 1947) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Oaxaca. He also served as Mayor of Oaxaca de Juárez from 1995 to 1998. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Oaxaca City Category:Mayors of places in Mexico Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:Politicians from Oaxaca Category:Benito Juárez Autonomous University of Oaxaca alumni Category:20th-century Mexican politicians
title: Pablo Arnaud Carreño
